articles.title: Record UK wage growth adds to inflation fears; Europe markets cautiously higher: Live updates - CNBC
articles.description: European markets were higher after Wall Street snapped a three-day losing streak, with investors looking ahead to key U.S. inflation figures.

articles.title: Scientists Describe Shiniest Exoplanet: "Giant Mirror In Space" - NDTV
articles.description: Observations on the exoplanet were carried out by European Space Agency's Cheops (Characterising Exoplanet Satellite) mission.
articles.content:
Scientists said this is the first time a planet like this has been found so close to its star.
